items.sentence: Tom isn\'t as old as most people think he is.
Tom isn\'t going to be able to work tomorrow.
Tom fired a couple of shots in our direction.
Tom found a box of old pictures in the attic.
Tom never drinks except on special occasions.
Tom never objected to me dating his daughter.
Tom never really wanted to learn how to swim.
Tom never said he would go to Boston with us.
Tom never spoke to Mary again after that day.
Every time I see you, I think of your mother.
Every year seems shorter than the one before.
Where did you get the idea I don\'t like Tom?
Who\'s your favorite person to hang out with?
Tom is always telling Mary that he loves her.
Tom is reading a novel by Sidney Sheldon now.
Tom married a girl much younger than himself.
Tom said he hoped to be back by October 20th.
You\'re supposed to be helping Tom, you know.
You\'re supposed to be here tomorrow at 2:30.
You\'re supposed to be the smartest guy here.
